name: gitlab
description: GitLab is a comprehensive DevOps platform that includes Git hosting, CI/CD, security scanning, and project management. The FOSS edition allows self-hosting with an extensive web UI and API for enterprise workflows.

features.title: Complete Devops Platform
features.description: Unified platform for source control, CI/CD, security, and deployment management

features.title: Security Scanning
features.description: Integrated SAST, DAST, dependency scanning, and container scanning for vulnerability detection

features.title: Project Management
features.description: Plan work with issues, epics, milestones, and agile boards in one interface

features.title: Code Review
features.description: Merge requests with inline comments, approval rules, and code quality reports

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Built-in Docker registry with vulnerability scanning and cleanup policies

features.title: Wiki And Documentation
features.description: Maintain project documentation with integrated wiki and pages
